title: Bacon Day Marks Bacon Brawl Challenge Kick-Off
text:
Bacon Day Marks Bacon Brawl Challenge Kick-Off Chicago, IL (PRWEB) September 04, 2015 Bacon Day Marks Bacon Brawl Challenge Kick-Off Grunt Style Honors Its Love for Bacon Enlists Americans to Do the Same Grunt Style, a veteran-owned and operated company, specializing in warrior-inspired apparel and gear for men and women, is proud to commemorate Bacon Day, Sept. 5 with its Bacon Brawl challenge. Grunt Styles big-bacon throw down encourages Americans to share a video proving their unyielding love for bacon. After serving two tours overseas and returning back to the states, the first thing I wanted to eat was bacon. Bacon means home the smell, the taste and the family and friends you share it with its an American tradition, said Daniel Alarik, Grunt Style founder and commander. Grunt Style is a group of freedom-loving patriots that love bacon, too. Our Bacon Brawl challenge celebrates bacon but more importantly all the things that make this country kick-ass. How it Works Bacon-lovers create a video for a chance to win Grunt Style gear, premium bacon products, and a trip to GruntFest II. Step One: Shoot a video (two minutes or less) and tell Grunt Style how you celebrate the deliciousness of bacon give it your spin how you cook it, eat it, serve it and honor it. Be creative. Keep it clean, but have some fun. Step Two: Post it to YouTube.com, link to the video from your personal Facebook or Twitter page with #GSBaconBrawl by Friday, Oct. 9th. Step Three: Grunt Style picks five finalists and posts them at Gruntstyle.com/BaconBrawl for voting Oct. 14. Vote. Tell everyone you know to vote. Eat bacon. Grunt Style Bacon Brawl winner crowned Oct. 23 The Goods The winner of the Grunt Style Bacon Brawl challenge gets a trip for two to GruntFest II in 2016 (location TBD), Grunt Style American Bacon t-shirt, two free Grunt Style t-shirts a month for a year, and what else? Bacon. Grunt Style partners at Bacon Freak and J&Ds BaconSalt load up the winner with premium bacon and seasoning products. The four Bacon Brawl finalists dont go home empty handed; they win a Grunt Style American Bacon t-shirt and delicious premium bacon and seasonings from Bacon Freak and J&Ds BaconSalt. To learn more about the Grunt Style Bacon Brawl challenge, visit Gruntstyle.com/BaconBrawl for more details, prizes, and rules and regulations. (Cmon there has to be a few) ### About Grunt Style Grunt Style is a veteran-owned and operated company, specializing in-house designed, quality apparel and gear for men and women. It provides its customers with a voice through its warrior-inspired merchandise to share and inspire patriotism in the United States. Founded in 2009 by Army Veteran and Drill Sergeant, Daniel Alarik, who has grown the company from first printing t-shirts in his basement to its headquarters in Carol Stream, Ill. with 90+ employees. Grunt Style takes the best of whats gained by serving in the military structure, dedication and camaraderie and employs 75 percent military veterans and 100 percent American patriots. Grunt Styles ethos is Pride in self, in our military and in our county. All Grunt Style shirts have a Beer Guarantee and are covered for life. For more information, visit http://www.gruntstyle.com or find Grunt Style on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or Pinterest. Get access to Grunt Style's latest clothing, gear and articles and download the new Grunt Style mobile app for Android or Apple. Use the "mobile1" code with the app and receive $5 off any order over $25. 
Read the full story at http://www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12942929.htm .
